tables.Attribute ID: This theme is automatically assigned to properties that present a minimum of 5 onsite or nearby adventure sport type of recreation activities.

If a property provides an adequate amount of adventure sport type of activities that are not all available in Partner Central (e.g. wakeboarding), we can still include it in the Theme by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, ADVENTURE attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE ADVENTURE attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **5 of the following** attributes, or **4 of the following** plus **1 from the ski-related attributes** listed below.

rules.description: Properties must have **5 of the following** attributes, or **4 of the following** plus **1 from the ski-related attributes** listed below.

definition.text: This theme is automatically assigned to properties that are on the beach, or that have direct access to it (sea, ocean).

This theme is to be assigned **manually** to properties that feature **unique and upscale decor**.
Guestrooms are individually furnished and feature added touches, often with locally influenced décor and artwork.
Boutique properties typically have fewer than 100 rooms and are mostly unbranded. Some may belong to designated hotel collections (e.g., Design Hotels, Preferred Hotels).

This theme is automatically assigned to properties offering services and facilities for business travellers.
- The **Structure Type** determines qualifying attributes.
- Logic is split between **Conventional Lodgings** and **Vacation Rentals**.
- Certain hotel **Brands** automatically qualify (see list at the end).

conventional_lodging.description:
- **Minimum requirement**:
- One Internet access attribute
- **AND** `Desk` (AID 2026)
- **AND** At least 3 more attributes across at least 2 different categories
(Attributes listed below...)
---

rules.description: - **Minimum requirement**:

vacation_rental.description:
- **Minimum requirement**:
- One Internet access attribute
- **AND** `Desk` (AID 2026)
- **AND** At least 3 more attributes from 2+ categories
(Attributes listed below...)
---

rules.description: - **Minimum requirement**:

tables.Description: This theme is automatically assigned to properties that host an on-site casino (and not just slot machines or video gaming)
If a property is adjacent to a casino, we can still include it in the Theme by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, CASINO attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVERRIDE, REMOVE CASINO attribute

This theme is automatically assigned to properties that belong to one of recognized programs outlined below and must present a certificate as proving they have been awarded the certification. Unless otherwise noted, all awards are bulk-updated quarterly. Partners may request a certification be added or removed as needed, but must provide documentation from one of the organizations listed below proving certification status. This can be a link to the organization's website where the property details are listed. Whenever a relevant program in the Awards & Affiliations section is selected, it will generate the following text: "This property participates in {GreenProgramName}, a program that measures the property's impact on one or more of the following: environment, community, cultural-heritage, the local economy.”
In exceptional situations we can use the THEME OVER-RIDE, GREEN attribute (Attribute not yet in use. Exceptions to be confirmed in #lodging-content-discussion slack channel)
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE GREEN attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

certification_programs.Program: Green Key Fee (Foundation for Environmental Education)
certification_programs.Notes: EMEA/APAC focused. Sends EG a list each quarter with updated membership.
AMER focused. Both Green Key programs are affiliated with each other

rules.description: Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

tables.Description: This theme is automatically assigned to properties providing services and amenities for children. The Structure Type determines the qualifying attributes. The logic is split between Conventional Lodgings and Vacation Rentals

In exceptional situations we can still include a property without qualifying attributes by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, FAMILY attribute. The override can be used for Structure Types that are not included in the automation logic (see below)

Properties assigned the following Structure Types are not included in the theme automation logic: Cruise, Hostal, Hostel, Pousada (Brazil), Pousada (Portugal), Campsite, Capsule hotel. When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE FAMILY attribute (attribute 5090). Properties catering to specific targets are excluded from this theme (see disqualifying attributes below)

conventional_lodging.description:
Properties must have:
- **2 of the following primary attributes** AND
- **A minimum of 2 attributes (total) from 2 different categories** from the secondary attributes list

rules.description: Properties must have:

vacation_rental.description:
Properties must have:
- **2 of the following primary attributes** AND
- **A minimum of 3 attributes (total) from 3 different categories** from the secondary attributes list

rules.description: Properties must have:

disqualifying_attributes.description: Properties with any of the following attributes are excluded from the Family theme:

attributes.Attribute: Clothing optional (nudity permitted in public areas)
This property is designed for adult entertainment

tables.Description: This theme is automatically assigned to properties that have a golf course onsite or that are physically adjacent to a golf course
In exceptional situations (e.g. bulk-loads) we can still include a property without qualifying attributes by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, GOLF attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE GOLF attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

rules.description: Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

tables.Description: This theme can be assigned to properties situated in historic buildings that have been recognized with a national historic designation from one of the Awards and Affiliations below: AID 5007 (Historic Hotels of America), AID 5008 (Historic Hotels of the World), AID 5006 (Historic Hotels of Europe), AID 5009 (Heritage Hotels of India)

If a property does not appear on one of the above sites, but presents distinct historic characteristics in public spaces, bedrooms, and building architecture, we can still include it in the Theme by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, HISTORIC attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, RMV HISTORIC attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **one of the following** national historic designations:

rules.description: Properties must have **one of the following** national historic designations:

tables.Description: This theme is automatically assigned to properties with natural hot springs on-site or within a short walking distance
In exceptional situations (e.g. bulk-loads) we can still include a property without qualifying attributes by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, HOT SPRINGS attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE HOT SPRINGS attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

rules.description: Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

tables.Description:
This theme is manually assigned to:
- Properties affiliated to IGLTA (proof is required*)
- Properties that request LGBTQ content to be added to the Expedia listing
- Brands opt-in (Bulk-loaded) - LGBTQ coverage tracker
This attribute is located in the Policy section and is compatible with all Themes.
In addition to being part of filters, it generates the following text on properties pages for all EG sites: "This property welcomes guests of all sexual orientations and gender identities (LGBTQ friendly)"

Properties located in countries part of the list below are not included in the LGBTQ theme.
There are countries that impose civil penalties ranging from imprisonment to death if people are perceived to be Lesbian Gay Bisexual Transgender (LGBT) or participate in LGBT behavior.
Even though some properties in these countries may be gay-friendly and may also be IGLTA-affiliated hotels*, we do not add the LGBTQ attribute (primarily in the Middle East and some parts of Asia) at this time.
Below is a list of all countries that should NEVER display any LGBTQ attributes (list also available in Excel: LGBTQ_countryPOSu_exclusions (Updated list Oct 2021).xlsx

This theme is automatically assigned to properties meeting one of the below requirements:
- Property has 5 stars
- Property has 4.5 stars
- Property has 4 stars AND at least 1 of the Awards and Affiliations attributes below

If a property has a luxury feeling and provides upscale services, but is rated less than 4.5 stars because of an official rating, we can still include it in the Theme by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, LUXURY attribute

Properties assigned the following Structure Types are not considered for the theme: Motel, Hostel/Backpacker, Hostal, Pousada (Brazil), Campsite, Capsule hotel.
Select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE LUXURY attribute when:
- Partners request not being included in the Theme filter
- A property has an official rating of 4.5 or 5 stars, but does not present upscale decor and services

rules.description: Property has 5 stars
Property has 4.5 stars
Property has 4 stars
property has a luxury feeling
property has an official rating of 4.5

tables.Description: This theme is automatically assigned to properties that allow pets onsite. To qualify for theme, properties must have at least one pet-related qualifying attributes as described below
In exceptional situations (e.g. bulk-loads) we can still include a property without qualifying attributes by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, PETS attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE PETS attribute. Properties where pets are not allowed - see below

rules.description: properties must have at least one pet-related qualifying attributes as described below
must have at least one pet-related qualifying attributes as described below

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

attributes.Attribute: Maximum number of pets per room

rules.description: Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

tables.Description: This theme is manually assigned to upscale properties featuring romance packages (bottle of champagne with flowers upon arrival, turndown service with chocolate, spa treatment, breakfast in room, etc.) and to couples-only resorts

When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, RMV ROMANTIC attribute. Not included in the Romantic theme are the following: Economy Brands/Chains, Airport Hotels, Convention Center Hotels, City Center Business Hotels, Hotels explicitly targeting families in bold tagline, Properties in the Family Theme, Properties specifically targeting Business Travelers in bold tag line, Properties with lower than a 3.0 Traveler Opinion Score, "Love Hotels"
This theme is manually assigned during maintenance cases if requested by partners. To qualify, the property must be located "In shopping district" (AID 3057) of one of the cities listed below.
This theme is automatically assigned to ski-in/ski-out accommodation or to properties that provide a ski shuttle. See qualifying attributes below

If a property does not have qualifying attributes, but is located within 2-3 minutes walking distance from a public ski shuttle, or by the ski lifts (see red dotted line on maps), we can still include it in the Theme by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, SKI attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE SKI attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

rules.description: Properties must have **1 of the following** attributes:

tables.Description: This theme is automatically assigned to properties that have a full spa or that offer a minimum of 5 from the qualifying attributes as described below
In exceptional situations (e.g. bulk-loads) we can still include a property without qualifying attributes by selecting the THEME OVER-RIDE, SPA attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER-RIDE, REMOVE SPA attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **either**:
- A full-service spa **OR**
- **2 of the following** attributes **AND** **3 of the additional attributes** listed below

rules.description: Full-service spa OR 2 primary + 3 additional attributes

primary_attributes.Attribute: Spa treatment room(s) - Must have at least 2
Outdoor private mineral hot springs (Japanese-style onsen)

tables.Description: This theme is automatically assigned to properties that have an on-site winery/vineyard
If a property is located nearby a winery, we can include it in the theme by adding the THEME OVER-RIDE, WINERY attribute
When partners request not being included in the Theme filter, select the THEME OVER RIDE, REMOVE WINERY attribute

qualifying_attributes.description:
## Qualifying Attributes
Properties must have **either**:
- A winery attached **OR**

rules.description: Winery attached OR Both vineyard + tasting room
